item.description:
The Greater Boston Scooter Club has their popular monthly "Take your scooter to breakfast" event, being held at the Ball Sq. Cafe‏ , in Somerville.

This should prove to be a great scooter breakfast event and a way for the two clubs to meet and greet. Last month we had lots of fun for breakfast at IHOP, and now with CityScoots we figured we will have twice the fun ! ! !

The food is world renowned, and pancakes are just flat out fun!

Hope to see you there!

Doug

P.S. Afterward if you like join us for "take your scooter to the beach" as we head up Rt 1 to the Clam Box in Ipswich for lunch. Group departs at 11AM from the restaurant.
item.how_to_find_us: Wearing Scooter Gear - Blue Joe Rocket Jacket
item.name: Take Your Scooter To Breakfast Series - At The Somerville Ball Sq Cafe
